Random_exec module

class Random_exec.RandomTransitionsExecuter(directory, merge_csv=0, number_test_per_cpu=5, number_runs_per_each=10, time_out=300000000000)[source]

Bases: object

Executes verification for randomly generated Finite State Machine (FSM) transitions, storing results in CSV files.

Parameters:

  • directory (str) – Directory where FSM definitions and results are stored.

  • merge_csv (bool) – Flag to merge individual CSV results into a single file.

  • number_test_per_cpu (int) – Number of tests to process concurrently per CPU.

  • number_runs_per_each (int) – Number of verification runs for each FSM.

  • time_out (int) – Timeout limit for processing each FSM.

count_all_path_in_fsm()[source]

Counts all paths in FSMs defined in text files and updates CSV data with the counts.

merge_and_delete()[source]

Merges individual CSV result files into a single file and cleans up.

process_all_txt_files()[source]

Processes all text files containing FSM definitions for verification.

read_csv_data(path)[source]

Reads CSV data from a given path into a dictionary.

Random_exec.function_to_count_num_path(list_, csv_data, index, directory, time_out=300000000000)[source]

Counts the number of paths in FSMs defined in text files and updates a CSV data structure with the counts.

Parameters:

  • list (list[str]) – List of text file paths containing FSM definitions.

  • csv_data (dict[str, Any]) – Dictionary mapping text file paths to CSV data rows.

  • index (int) – Index to distinguish output CSV files.

  • directory (str) – Directory to save the output CSV file.

  • time_out (float) – Timeout limit for processing each FSM.

Random_exec.function_to_run(list_, csv_data, index, directory, number_runs_per_each, time_out=300000000000)[source]

Processes Finite State Machines (FSMs) defined in text files, runs verification, and updates CSV data with the results.

Parameters:

  • list (list[str]) – List of text file paths containing FSM definitions.

  • csv_data (dict) – Dictionary mapping text file paths to CSV data rows.

  • index (int) – Index to distinguish output CSV files.

  • directory (str) – Directory to save the output CSV file.

  • number_runs_per_each (int) – Number of verification runs for each FSM.

  • time_out (int) – Timeout limit for processing each FSM.
